org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime

接口 LinuxContainerRuntime

  • 所有超级接口:
    ContainerRuntime
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultLinuxContainerRuntime, DelegatingLinuxContainerRuntime, DockerLinuxContainerRuntime, JavaSandboxLinuxContainerRuntime

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public interface LinuxContainerRuntime
extends ContainerRuntime
    Linux-specific container runtime implementations must implement this interface.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void initialize(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, Context nmContext)
      Initialize the runtime.
      boolean isRuntimeRequested(Map<String,String> env)
      Return whether the given environment variables indicate that the operation is requesting this runtime.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.runtime.ContainerRuntime

        getIpAndHost, launchContainer, prepareContainer, reapContainer, relaunchContainer, signalContainer

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        void initialize(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                Context nmContext)
         throws ContainerExecutionException
        Initialize the runtime.
        参数:
        conf - the Configuration to use
        nmContext - NMContext
        抛出:
        ContainerExecutionException - if an error occurs while initializing the runtime

      • isRuntimeRequested

        boolean isRuntimeRequested(Map<String,String> env)
        Return whether the given environment variables indicate that the operation is requesting this runtime.
        参数:
        env - the environment variable settings for the operation
        返回:
        whether this runtime is requested
